doc.field: New York State National Guard, 9th Regiment collection
New York State National Guard, 9th Regiment collection
Series II: Veterans Association Meeting Minutes
Series II: Veterans Association Meeting Minutes

This series contains minute books of the Veterans of the Ninth Regiment N.G.S.N.Y. (1871-1922) and the Board of Trustees for the Association (1900-1918). For the most part, the contents discuss veteran related affairs, including arrangements for banquets, commemmorations, and other events, as well as various financial and administrative matters.
